registration.title: Welcome to Catena-X
registration.mainDescription: Thank you for registering with us. You have started your registration process but a few things are still missing.
registration.description: At the current state of the registration you cannot access the portal. After completing all phases of the registration you will get limited access to the portal while your registration is being reviewed.
registration.helpText: If you have any questions regarding your registration please contact our Helpdesk:

registration-requests.introText1: The application request board includes all current outstanding application requests as well as an overview of confirmed and declined company applications to the Catena-X Network.
registration-requests.introText2: If an application is approved, the registration company will receive access to the CX portal to start the technical and functional onboarding. Please make sure that you validate the application request details before approving a request.

overlay.title: Company Registration Details
overlay.companydatadescription: Below you can find the details of the company registration

confirmmodal.title: Confirm action
confirmmodal.description: Are you sure to make action on selected request?

confirmCancelModal.title: Cancel Application Process of {companyName}
confirmCancelModal.description: Are you sure you want to cancel the application process of {companyName}?
confirmCancelModal.details: With confirming the cancellation, the registration company will get informed and the cancellation message added below will be shared.
confirmCancelModal.note: Please note that the cancellation wont allow the company to register again, as long as no new registration is triggered.
confirmCancelModal.error: Please revalidate your input; the message should not start with '='.

addBpn.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

slider1.title: Catena-X
slider1.subtitle: the gateway to the automotive digital network

slider2.title: Use Case Introduction
slider2.subtitle: Get to know the supported use cases, related semantic models and apps to start your use case driven onboarding journey.

slider3.title: Marketplaces
slider3.subtitle: Transparent and interobarble service and business application marketplace to realize new ideas and use data optimally

slider4.title: User Management
slider4.subtitle: Manage user access centrally to reduce administrative work and ensure a transparent overview of all user rights.

emptyCards.title: New apps will get added here as soon as you have any assigned

favoriteSection.title: My Favorite Applications
favoriteSection.noFavoriteDescription: Your app favorites will show up in this section as soon as favorites selected.

semantichub.title: Semantic Data Models
semantichub.introText_0: Semantic models are used to structure data. As a concept, they make it possible to give fundamental meaning to data and their relationships. In the context of data modeling and data organization they realize the development of applications as well as the maintenance of data consistency.
semantichub.introText_1: In Catena-X, semantic data models are provided in a suitable publication system, the so-called Semantic Hub. For data or service providers, the Semantic Hub presents a foundation for the use and reuse of semantic models. For this reason, the publication of a semantic data model takes place under the specification of a version. This supports transparency as well as control over all semantic models and their release status.

filter.objNamePlaceholder: Enter a object name to filter

deleteDialog.title: Delete aspect model
deleteDialog.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete the aspect model?
deleteDialog.info: Note: If you delete the model now, you won't be able to reactivate it later.

detail.fileError: Error: The file could not be loaded.
detail.ttlTooltip: The downloaded Turtle file looks different but is semantically the same compared to the uploaded Turtle file for the Aspect. To further develop existing Aspects refer to the source Turtle files (e.g. in the Catena-X BAMM Model GitHub Repository)
detail.downloadTitle: Download options related to this aspect model

openApi.inputLabel: Enter a base URL to change the default open API URL.

detail.nomodelText: The used URN is either incorrect or the model does not yet exist.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe Business Application
unsubscribe.description: Are you sure to unsubscribe from the business application?
unsubscribe.note: Please Note: all possibly connected objects (see details above) will get deactivated as well.The unsubscription is not revertible.
unsubscribe.checkBoxLabel: Yes I agree that I understood the unsubscribe impact and want to proceed with the process.

appoverview.title: App Overview

recently.subheader: Below you can find your recently changed apps. By clicking on the app, you can open up the deatils/proceed on the app release process. The sub-menu added to each app card will help you to do changes on active apps. Below the recent changed apps, a list of all by your company provided apps can get found. Please scroll down to get more details.

confirmModal.title: Change app {appName}
confirmModal.description: The app configuration is currently 'work in progress'. Do you want to open the app release process for {appName} and further enhance the app details? Please note you do not need to finish the app release configuration. You can use the save button and proceed later if wanted.

details.title: Submitted App Details
details.description: The app {appName} is already submitted for review by the network administrator to publish the app on the market place. Till the review is finished, you can not do any changes to the app

appoverview.submenuNotAvail: Sub-Menu is not available for inactive apps.

deactivate.description: Deactivation of business applications will deactivate the app offer inside the Catena-X marketplace. Any current active subscription will stay active and customers wont be effected by the deactivation. New subscriptions are not possible.
deactivate.checkboxLabel: Hereby I confirm that I have read the business app terms and conditions and that I am deactivating my company business application from the marketplace with immediate effect. I understand that it is not possible to self-reverse the deactivation.
deactivate.checkboxErrorMsg: Please confirm that you have read the deactivation impact above before proceeding

columns.name: Connector Name
columns.sdRegistrationToolTip: The Self-Description is triggered. Process might take up to a couple of minutes.

configurationDetails.title: Connector Configuration for authentication flow
configurationDetails.description: Your edc instance need to get connected to the catena-x identity provider for the technical user authentication flow to fetch the user token and authenticate against the MIW. Additionally the MIW endpoint, authority BPN and your technical user need to get configured/set to ensure that the connection works correctly.

orderList.title: Below you can find the relevant details regarding all those values
orderList.clientId: * client id: client id of your existing or newly created tech user - details how to:
orderList.clientSecret: * client secret: client id of your existing or newly created tech user - details how to:

edcconnector.noConnectorsMessage: Currently there are no onboarded connectors existing. New registered connectors will get added here as soon as available.
edcconnector.imagetext: The connector combines the benefits of IDS connectors (secure and standardized communication, data usage control) with the interoperability. To register your connector inside the network and create your connector self-description, please register your connector below.

deletemodal.title: Delete Connector
deletemodal.description: Do you really want to delete the registered connector? Please note that the deletion is not reversable.
deletemodal.techUserdescription:
Do you really want to delete the connector? With the deletion the connector will be automatically deleted from the „connector discovery“ endpoint as well as the self-description document will be set to inactive.

 Please note, the connector has a technical user connected – the technical user will get inactived immediadetly as well when proceeding with the deletion.
deletemodal.techUserCheckBoxLabel: Yes, I want to deactivate the connector which will automatically also delete the mentioned technical user.

company.title: Connect company connector
company.intro: Registration of a company connector which is implemented in your own company network.
company.disableDescription: This option is only available if your company is Active Participant. Company roles can get changed by the company admin /company-role

managed.title: Register Managed Connector
managed.intro: Register a managed connector of your customer / 3rd party provided. This selection is mainly service provider relevant, which offers managed connectors to data provider/consumer. If you want to register your own connector, please use the selection above.
managed.disableDescription: This option is only available if your company is App Provider or Service Provider. Company roles can get changed by the company admin /company-role

name.label: Name*

patternError.lengthError: Connector name length should be between 2 and 20.
patternError.otherError: Connector name can not start with special character or empty space. Allowed special characters are @_:;.-%&?,'!.

name.tooltipMsg: Own selected connector name for verification

url.label: Connector URL/Endpoint*
url.error: Enter a valid url - eg: https://catena-x.net
url.tooltipMsg: URL of the connector endpoint. Only https:// endpoints are allowed

bpn.label: Connector Owner*
bpn.error: BPN is mandatory. Valid BPN eg: BPNL+12 characters
bpn.tooltipMsg: BPN of the company in which name the connector will be used to generate data offers or consume data

country.label: Location*
country.tooltipMsg: Connector Location Country Code - e.g. DE, US, etc.

doc.label: Public Authentication Key/Certificate*
doc.error: Please use a valid type. E.g. .pem; .cert
doc.tooltipMsg: Upload the certificate that contains your connector's public key information.

step2.heading: Enter user data in upload form

addMultipleUsers.fileSizeError: Uploaded file is too big. Maximum 100KB is allowed

uploadedFile.addUserRolesHeading: Add user roles for all users in bulk upload:
uploadedFile.note1: Only assign roles that apply to all users in the bulk upload file - individual roles can be applied individually later.
uploadedFile.note2: Roles for applications can be assigned after the user(s) have been successfully created.
uploadedFile.note3: We suggest to assign CX User initially to all bulk uploaded users and set specific user permissions separately.

success.errorUsersLabel:
Errors have occured for the following usernames:
Please check their entries in the upload file and try upload it again.

error.description: The upload failed due to technical issue. Please try it later once again or contact your administrator.

technicalUser.headline: Technical user management {{company}}
technicalUser.descriptionText: The technical user is an identity that a company can use to connect to CX backend services without continous disconnection. For example, a run-as technical user is required for connecting to the digital twin registry or the semantic model. Please use the action button to request a new technical user with the roles as per your need. Or manage already existing technical users by using the user management function below.
technicalUser.confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete technical user {{ user }}?
technicalUser.noteDeleteUser: Note: The deletion will be permanently. It is not possible the reactive the user again.
technicalUser.confirmDeleteNotificationDescription: The action can not be reversed. Please create a new user in case it's needed

deleteUserConfirm.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete the user account of {userName}?
deleteUserConfirm.description: By deleting the account, the access of this user to Catena-X as well as any rights and data access will get revoked.
deleteUserConfirm.note: Note: If you delete the account now, you wont be able to reactivate it later.
deleteUserConfirm.successDescription: The user got successfully deleted. All rights have been disabled. Please note that the user might still be able to use the application for the next 10 minutes. Latest in 10 minutes the user is automatically logged out and a new login attempt will get declined
deleteUserConfirm.errorDescription: Your user couldn't get deleted. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

suspendUserConfirm.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to suspend the user account of {userName}?
suspendUserConfirm.description: By suspending the account, the access of this user to Catena-X as well as any permissions and data accesses will get deactivated temporarily.
suspendUserConfirm.note: Note: Suspended accounts can get reactivated anytime.
suspendUserConfirm.successDescription: The user is successfully suspended and all rights are disabled.
suspendUserConfirm.errorDescription: Your user couldn't get suspended. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

resetPasswordConfirm.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to reset the password?
resetPasswordConfirm.note: The user {userName} will receive an email to reset the password.
resetPasswordConfirm.successDescription: The password reset request got send to {userName}.
resetPasswordConfirm.errorDescription: The password reset was unsuccessful. Please try it later again or contact the administrator.

deleteOwnUserConfirm.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this user account?
deleteOwnUserConfirm.description: By deleting the account, the access of this user to Catena-X as well as any rights and data access will get revoked.
deleteOwnUserConfirm.note: Note: If you delete the account now, you wont be able to reactivate it later.
deleteOwnUserConfirm.successDescription: Your user got successfully deleted, you will get disconnected within the following 5 seconds.
deleteOwnUserConfirm.errorDescription: Your user couldn't get deleted. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

idpmanagement.addIdpSubheadline: Enter an IdP name and choose the idp type to start the configuration
idpmanagement.updateIdpSubheadline:
Configure your idp connection. Retrieve the metadata config file from your local idp and upload the same in the input field below. Additionally the client_id and secret are needed.
Follow the
idpmanagement.updateIdpSubheadline2: to find a number of examples of local idp's such as Azure, Keycloak, etc.
idpmanagement.enableIdpSubheadline: This will open another option for people from your company to sign.
idpmanagement.enableIdpSuccessSubheadline: Go and test the login now
idpmanagement.disableIdpSubheadline: This will remove the option to sign in for people of your company
idpmanagement.description: Here you can manage how the users of your company authenticate with Catena-X. On registration we have created an IDP with one user entry for the admin (that's probably you ;). Many companies already have their own IDP where users authenticate using their known company user id and a familiar login mask. In this case you will probably prefer to use your own company IDP and you can create and manage the federation on this page.

idpdetail.title: Identity Provider Details
idpdetail.selectIpsText: Select the type of IdP which should get newly created
idpdetail.addMetaDataText: Add your metadata URL here, to automatically setup all the idp integration relevant metadata. When clicking, load. then metadata file is getting loaded and respective values will show up below.
idpdetail.idp_meta_description: Add your metadata URL here, to automatically setup all the idp integration relevant metadata. When clicking, Load then metadata file is getting loaded and respective values will show up below.

addUser.headline: Add User Account
addUser.subheadline: Add a new user account by adding the user first and last name as well as the email address. Below the input fields select the respective user roles which the user should have. One role is minimum needed to enable the user to access the network.
addUser.multipleUserHeadline: Add multiple users by file upload:
addUser.multipleUserSubheadline: Please use this <1>upload template</1>, to add multiple users via the bulk load.
addUser.technicalUserSubheadline: Create a technical user by adding the relevant information requested below. Please note that the description is used for your own reference only. In case you have a number of technical users it will help you to differenciate between the technical user accounts.
addUser.technicalUserSubheadlineSuccess: Congratulations, the technical user got successfully created. Below you can find all the relevant details needed to apply the technical user for your service connection. Please ensure that you keep this secrets confidential.
addUser.technicalUserSubheadlineError: Something went wrong. The technical user did not got created due to a system error. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.
addUser.helperText: Please enter all required information before proceeding.

addOverlay.serviceSubHeading: Select one of the following service roles:

logout.message: We are logging you out now... Hope to see you again soon!

notfound.message: The content could not be found. This can happen because of various reasons - either
notfound.title: Something went wrong.
notfound.description: You don't have access to this page or the page doesn't exist. Please contact your admin.

privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.message: The Privacy Policy states which data the business applications collects, handles and processes. The details below explicitly show which company / user information are getting collected/stored.

howtouse.heading: Documents
howtouse.message: The terms of use, as well as the data models and further information can be viewed by clicking on the documents shared below.

providerInformation.heading: Provider Information
providerInformation.message: If you have any question, want to get in contact or visit the provider website, you can find all necessary information below.

technicalUserSetup.heading: Technical User Setup
technicalUserSetup.message: The technical user profile defined below displays the user permission which the technical user created as part of the app/service activation gets automatically assigned.

appdetail.pendingTooltip: Application subscription is pending. The app provider is informed
appdetail.subscribedTooltip: The app is already subscribed by your company

apprelease.descHeading: Publish your company app inside the Catena-X marketplace
apprelease.descMessage: Register your app and metdata to get published on the marketplace. Scrolling down, you can find a quick overview of the app release process.
apprelease.stepHeading: The process will guide your through the following steps:
apprelease.dividerText: Lets get started to publishing your app...

appMarketCard.headerDescription: The following input fields and uploads are used to create your app 'App Card' which will be placed inside the marketplace. The app card is the first touchpoint with the customer. While entering the data below, have a look at the app card on the left side which is getting autoupdated based on your input.
appMarketCard.defaultCardShortDescriptionEN: [short description EN] this section will get replaced with your app short description
appMarketCard.salesManagerDescription: Please select the app sales manager via the dropdown below. The sales manager can only get set if a user of your company has the respective portal role. The sales manager will get informed as soon as a app subscribtion request is triggered by the customer.
appMarketCard.pricingInformation: Pricing Information (e.g. free / charged (to be defined))

appPage.headerDescription: Fill out your app details page. On the marketplace the following added information will be public available for customers to get a extended view of your application supported functions as well as necessary details regarding security, architecture, etc.
appPage.pleaseEnterValidHomePageURL: Please enter a valid url - eg: https://catena-x.net
appPage.pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid Customer Contact E-Mail
appPage.pleaseEnterValidContact: Please add a valid phone number and in the following format: “+ xx xxxx xxxxxx”, “+ xxx xxxx-xxxx”, “+xx xxxxxxxxxx”. Note: more formats are allowed, mentioned formats are the most used formats.
appPage.privacyInformationDescription: The privacy information is used to display data types the app may collect on the app detail page. You may select several options OR select “none”.
appPage.privacyInfoError: Error - values couldn't get fetched. Please try it later again or contact your administrator.

contractAndConsent.headerDescription: To publish your app on the marketplace, a number of Catena-X specific agreements need to get signed by you. Please have a look at the mentioned agreements and agree to them via the checklist approval.

technicalIntegration.headerDescription: Integrate your app with the catena-x dataspace. For the integration you need to upload the application supported roles as well as the necessary technical user profile which is needed to run your application inside the network. Please note: in this step you are only setting the frame of the authentication - no users are going to get created. If you need any support feel free to use the 'Help' button or the attached template.
technicalIntegration.step1HeaderDescription: Upload your application roles which can get assigned to user identities to be able to access the application.
technicalIntegration.step2HeaderDescription: Setup the technical profile of a technical user/service account of needed permissions to be able to run the application inside the dataspace.
technicalIntegration.uploadRolesDescription: Upload all app roles by using the available upload template (csv) file added attached

serviceMarketplace.headline: Purchase Service Request
serviceMarketplace.description: Dear user, you have requested service {serviceName}. Please find below the Terms and Conditions. Please check the terms and conditions carefully before proceeding. As soon as the terms & conditions are approved, the services provider will start to build up the service.
serviceMarketplace.subscriptionHeading: >> there are already active subscriptions for the service {serviceName}

document.heading: Relevant Documents
document.message: The terms of use, as well as the data models and further information can be viewed by clicking on the documents shared below.

serviceMarketplace.errorMessage: The subscription was unsuccessful; please contact your administrator.

appMarketplace.headline: Business Application Subscription
appMarketplace.desc1: Do you want to trigger a subscription request for app {appName}?
appMarketplace.desc2: With click on 'Confirm' below, the app provider will get automatically informed about your request and start the subscription process. If additional informations are needed, the provider will contact you directly. The process may take up to 5 days.
appMarketplace.desc3: As soon as all queries are clarified, the app provider will be able to activate your app tenant and you will get automatically informed to take further steps.
appMarketplace.desc4: Please note: with confirming the app subscription request, the app provider will receive your dataspace available business partner data (company name, bpn, address, etc.) as well as your email address in case additional information are needed.
appMarketplace.statusHeading: For a better transparency, the subscription status bar will be available in the app detail page - you can check the subscription status when opening the app detail page from the app marketplace.
appMarketplace.errorMessage: The subscription was unsuccessful; please contact your administrator.

appSubscription.headline: App Subscription
appSubscription.description: Do you wan't to rather use the autosetup; connect your service to automate marketplace subscription build
appSubscription.search: ...search by entering the app name here.
appSubscription.subscriptionHeading: >> there are already active subscriptions for the service {serviceName}

document.heading: Relevant Documents
document.message: The terms of use, as well as the data models and further information can be viewed by clicking on the documents shared below.

register.heading: Autosetup URL
register.message: Enter your autosetup url in the input field below to store the autosetup endpoint. The endpoint will get triggered by CX as soon as a interested company is hitting the 'Subscribe' button in the marketplace.
register.providerErrorMessage: Something went wrong! Please try it later again.

activation.heading: Activate App Subscription
activation.description: Activate the app subscription request of the customer by adding your customer specific app endpoint/url in the input field below. We will use the url to register/activate the app authentication with the CX idp. Additionally you will receive a technical user which can get used to connect the app tenant/connector to the centryl CX components/services (where needed).
activation.stepDescription: In order to activate the subscription of {{companyName}}, follow the steps below.
activation.step2: System - technical user will get automatically generated and credentials getting shared
activation.step3: Configure your app with the specific technical user to ensure that the app is fully usable.
activation.addTentalURLDescription: The tenant url of the app is the customer specific url which the customer has to access to receive access to the application. Please note: only https:// addresses are allowed.
activation.technicalUserDetailsDescription: Below the technical user profile used to create the technical user for the app tenant is shared. With clicking on 'Confirm' below, the technical user is getting created with the respective configured permissions. Please note the technical user is customer specific.
activation.successDescription: The app subscription got successfully activated, the customer got informed via email about the app activation. Please find the technical user details below:

detailOverlay.title: Provider View
detailOverlay.appIdInfo: The client-id is crucial for OAuth2/OpenID Connect interactions. This identifier is sent as the client-id parameter in requests to the authorization server. It's used for client identification. With the subscription activation, the client id is getting created.
detailOverlay.technicalNameInfo: Technical user name of the technical user/service account created for the specific app subscription. You can click on the technical user name to retrieve client id and secret details.
detailOverlay.technicalPermissionInfo: Permissions assigned to the technical user.
detailOverlay.helpText: For any questions regarding these change(s), please contact the Catena-X helpdesk:

declineModal.title: Reject App Release Request {appName}
declineModal.subheading: Are you sure you want to reject the app release request ?
declineModal.declineReason1Label: Create a notification & email message to inform the app provider/manager about the rejection
declineModal.declineReason2Label: An individual message with additional details can get shared by adding the details into the input field below
declineModal.declineReason3Label: The app will get set back to the status “in progress“

connectedData.heading: Connected Data
connectedData.message: Following data might be used/stored by the app provider to enable you to use the complete functionality of the app.
connectedData.message2: When using the app, the following data may be collected:

Documents.heading: Documents
Documents.message: In the following section additional documents/information are shared by the app provider. Click on the document name to download them.

roles.heading: App Roles
roles.message: Business application roles and description configured/loaded for the respective app. The roles are used to provide app customers user specific access and restrict permissions between different user groups.
roles.roleDescription: The role description is expected to get displayed here in future.

technicalUserSetup.heading: Technical User Setup
technicalUserSetup.message: The technical user profile defined below displays the user permission which the technical user created as part of the app/service activation gets automatically assigned.
technicalUserSetup.roleDescription: The role description is expected to get displayed here in future.

providerInformation.heading: Provider Information
providerInformation.message: If you have any question, want to get in contact or visit the provider website, you can find all necessary information below.

checklistOverlay.resolveTitle: Your option to resolve the issue

REGISTRATION_VERIFICATION.stepDescription: Manual validation of the company registration by the operator. Please check the company details as well as uploaded documents and 'accept' / 'decline' the application; depending on the validation results
REGISTRATION_VERIFICATION.additionalText: By declining the application; the registration company will not be able to proceed; a new registration will be needed.

TO_DO.title: Your action is needed to resolve the issue
TO_DO.description: Validate the company registration data and the uploaded documents and confirm or reject the registration. Further process steps are only carried out after confirmation.

IN_PROGRESS.title: No action needed from your side

DONE.title: No action needed from your side

FAILED.title: No action needed from your side
FAILED.description: The registration company got informed about the declined registration form. A new application is needed if you want to proceed.

BUSINESS_PARTNER_NUMBER.stepDescription: Each registration company need to have a business partner number created. In this step the creation of the bpdm is triggered against the bpdm data pool.

TO_DO.title: No action needed from your side
TO_DO.description: The process gets auto triggered with the next automation run.

IN_PROGRESS.title: No action needed from your side

DONE.title: No action needed from your side

FAILED.title: Your action is needed.
FAILED.description: The BPN creation was unsuccessful. You can retrigger the endpoint or close/reject the company registration.

IDENTITY_WALLET.stepDescription: With successful business partner number creation as well as the manual validation of the company registration data; the managed identity wallet is getting generated for the participant.

TO_DO.title: No action needed from your side
TO_DO.description: The process gets auto triggered with the next automation run.

IN_PROGRESS.title: No action needed from your side
IN_PROGRESS.description: The process is currently running/in progress. As soon as the Wallet is created, the status will get automatically updated.

DONE.title: No action needed from your side
DONE.description: The process is successfully completed. The Managed Identity Wallet got created.

FAILED.title: Your action is needed.
FAILED.description: The Identity Wallet creation failed. You can retrigger the endpoint or close/reject the company registration.

CLEARING_HOUSE.stepDescription: Gaia-X Clearinghouse provider is validating the company registration form (company name; address and unique identifier) and after successful validation verified credentials are added to the managed wallet of the customer.

TO_DO.title: No action needed from your side
TO_DO.description: The process gets auto triggered with the next automation run.

IN_PROGRESS.title: No action needed from your side

DONE.title: No action needed from your side

FAILED.title: Your action is needed.
FAILED.description: The clearinghouse check was unsuccessful/failed. Details regarding the unsuccessful validation run may get found above. You can retrigger the endpoint (by resetting the status) or close/reject the company registration.

SELF_DESCRIPTION_LP.stepDescription: Legal person / company Self Description is created by the SD Factory and signed and send back by the clearinghouse. The process might take a while since its an asyncron interface.

TO_DO.title: No action needed from your side
TO_DO.description: The process gets auto triggered with the next automation run.

IN_PROGRESS.title: No action needed from your side

DONE.title: No action needed from your side

FAILED.title: Your action is needed.
FAILED.description: The self-description creation was unsuccessful. Details regarding the unsuccessful process can get found below. Additionally you can retrigger the endpoint (by resetting the status) or close/reject the company registration.

roleDetails.heading: Overview of the available Catena-X portal roles

companyRolesUpdate.heading: Change Company Role
companyRolesUpdate.description: Below you can manage the roles your company takes in Catena-X.
companyRolesUpdate.step1: You can change your current role by deselecting it and selecting another role.
companyRolesUpdate.step2: If you already have more than one role for your company, you can deselect roles. At least one role must always be assigned to your company.
companyRolesUpdate.step3: You can add a new role to your existing role by selecting one or more of the other available roles.
companyRolesUpdate.noteDetail: Changing the role affects the roles, rights, and functions available to your organization in the portal. You will see the impact of your changes before you make final changes to the role(s).
companyRolesUpdate.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try it later again.

overlay.title: Do you really want to change your company's role(s) within Cantena-X?
overlay.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
overlay.selectedRolesTitle: You have selected the following changes to your company's role profile:
overlay.changeRolesHeading: The change of your role has the following consequences:
overlay.termsHeading: Please agree to the following terms & conditions for new role profile:

usecaseParticipation.heading: Use Case Participation
usecaseParticipation.description:
Below you can manage your use case participation in Catena-X.
Please note - the selection of the usecase participatiance is relevant for data provider and data consumer.
usecaseParticipation.step1: You can view your current signed use case participation
usecaseParticipation.step2: You can sign additional use cases by selecting the document download, signing the document and upload the same
usecaseParticipation.noteDetail: Please note - use case participation revocation is currently not enabled. Please contact the platform owner for support.

editUsecase.title: Trigger the use case participation by signing and uploading the use case frame agreement for {{usecaseName}}
editUsecase.description: To be able to participate in the data exchange of the use case {{usecaseName}} please download the use case frame agreement {placeholder until download is available} and upload the signed document in the upload window below.After submission, the platform owner will validate the uploaded document you will be informed as soon as the validation is successfully finished
editUsecase.fileSizeError: Please upload only pdf file upto 2 MB.
editUsecase.checkboxLabel: Yes, I confirm that I have uploaded the signed use case frameagreement
editUsecase.success: Usecase document upload has been done successfully.

companyCertificate.noData: Currently there are no certificates for the company. You can start uploading a certificate by clicking the 'Upload Certificate' button above.
